forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of rain early. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. Low around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
